title: Mandarin Oriental wird den Anspruch an ein 5-Sterne Hotel nicht gerecht
positive: Zimmer entsprechen den Erwartungen an ein 5 Sterne Hotel weitestgehend, Zimmer hatte keine Kaffeemaschine.
negative:
Bedienung und Service bleibt weit hinter den Erwartungen an ein 5 Sterne Hotel zurück. 
Beim Einchecken erhält man eine beidseitig vollkpierten Seite Papier  mit einer Vielzahl von 2D Matrix codes für die einzelnen Services. 
Die links führen immer wieder ins Leere. 
WiFi ist schwach. Wenn das Hotel die Kunden auf Digitalisierung umerziehen möchte, dann muss die Technik einem 5-Sterne Hotel entsprechend erstklassig sein. Wirklich enttäuschend. 
Schade auch, dass der SPA an den Tagen unseres Aufenthalts wegen Ruhetagen geschlossen war. So viel kann man im Hotel ja nicht machen, zumal der tägliche Poolbesuch zeitlich stark eingeschränkt ist.
Die Infos in der Servicemappe zu Öffnungszeiten der Restaurants und den SPA Ruhetagen im Zimmer passen nicht zu den Infos in den Links.

title: 한국인들에게 평가가 좋고 유명한 곳이지만, 다른 대안도 많아 보임.
positive:
조식과 피트니스 센터 정도만 괜찮았어요.
그리고 조용한 것?
negative:
1. 한국인이 너무 많음.
2. 청소하는 분들이 말이 안 통함. 조식먹으러 나가는데 청소하는 분이 청소하러 들어오려고 하길래
나중에 청소 하라고 이야기 했고, 혹시나 해서 Do not disturb 버튼까지 눌러 두었음에도 멋대로 청소 하러 들어가서 시간 꼬임.
웃긴건 휴지통은 또 안 비워 놨길래, 일정 중간에 호텔에 전화해서 휴지통 비워놓으라고 요청했음. 알겠다고 전달하겠다고 했는데 돌아오니 아무것도 안 되어 있음..
3.
호텔 와이파이 객실번호랑 이름 적으면 사용 가능하다고 했는데 입력해도 안되어서 로비로 내려가니 따로 패스워드 줌..
4.
샴푸, 컨디셔너, 바디워시가 1회용이 아니고 벽에 벌크로 붙어있는데.. 이건 그래도 이해함.
5.
개인 물품 도난이 의심되는 사건도 있었는데, 이건 심증이고 결국 물건을 찾았기 때문에 자세히 적지는 않겠음.
6.
마리나 베이 뷰 1박당 세금 포함 조식포함 800SGD가 넘는 가격이었는데
아무리 싱가포르라지만 호텔 컨디션도 좀 오래되었고, 
서비스도 생각 외로 매끄럽지 못해서.. 이 가격을 주고 숙박할 만한 가치가 있는지는 모르겠음.
7.
뷰는 나쁘진 않지만 엄청난 환상을 가질 정도도 아님. 뷰는 밖에서 보는 게 훨씬 멋있음.

However, I also booked the room 1 month prior but I was still checked in late. It makes you think about the difference in treatment if you are a local. I am not a troublemaker hence I accept this as I want my kids to enjoy their stay.
6) Went to pool on the 3rd day and noticed that the staff did not attend to me and my kids. Ended up taking the pool towels myself. Upon observation, noticed the staff approaching other guests willingly and assists them accordingly.
In general, if you are a local, you MAY feel that the treatment is different to foreign guests. But overall it is a great experience as the room is huge.

The hotel is very tired and worn down, and we were very disappointed with it as we had looked forward to a luxurious stay in Singapore for four days. We heavily regretted that we hadn’t book the Shangri-la or one of the other luxury hotels in Singapore. We stayed in the City Suite and all furniture was either damaged or dirty looking from wear and tear. I am sure that they clean it, but when all lacquer is worn off and everything has scratches it just doesn’t look great. Many electrical sockets and installations are also very very old. The breakfast buffet is nice, but the Melt cafe looks like a cantina and didn’t exude any premium atmosphere either. The MO cocktail bar looks great and they serve great drinks.
In my opinion, the Mandarin Oriental Singapore is not a 5-star-hotel and Mandarin should be ashamed of themselves selling it as such for the condition the hotel is in. We have stayed in far better 4-star-hotels than this, so we recommend travelers to go for an alternative.

title: A Breathtaking View Of The Marina Bay & The Fireworks!
positive:
When booking the hotel room, I indicated that I wanted to have a good view of the fireworks from the NDP rehearsal. The staff emailed us suggesting to get a room with Marina Bay View instead of Ocean view. I appreciate the proactiveness of the staff. We had a breathtaking view of the Marina Bay & the fireworks! 
Also, when we entered the room, they left us wine/champagne & some kuih. We can't consume it so we called the staff to have it back. We didn't expect them to apologise and replace it with chilled orange juice.
Also, even though the restaurant do not have halal option, there are many halal certified restaurants and fast food outlet at Marina Square just beside the hotel. It's very convenient.

Early check in and late check-out were accommodated with no fuss and no charge.  Breakfast buffet good with a wide selection of cuisines. We enjoyed sitting outside for breakfast looking at the greenery.  Large comfortable bed.
negative: Coming from UAE where we are spoiled with numerous excellent newish hotels, this property felt a little older and therefore the bathroom for instance is not as modern as some funkier hotels. No bidet, and the shower head in the walk-in was fixed to the wall.  However the location, relaxed ambience, very comfortable bed, and well trained staff ensured that we enjoyed our short trip.
